summary:
book: Snape raised his brow.
antis:  thus facilitating traumatic feelings for a student, the continuation of his abusive...
body:
book: Snape raised his brow.

antis: thus facilitating traumatic feelings for a student, the continuation of his abusive behavior like him breathing precious oxygen, leaving none for the students, which resulted in him being their worst fear, worse than torture or pain, or monsters - his raised brow was the epitome of terror!!!

summary: The wizerding world of Harry Potter and Dahlia Evens
title: The wizerding world of Harry Potter and Dahlia Evens
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zeHlZS

by Faygocheesecake

Harry James Potter was supposed to be raised by the Dursley family, he was supposed to lead a sad, exiting and stressful life that would ultimately lead him to Ginny Weasley and defeating Lord Voldemort. In this World? His mother had a brother that took Harry in after he death and he would lead a life of stress, love and confusion, this life would lead him to Draco Malfoy yet Harry’s story is just a peace of the puzzle.

Oc’s that will apeare are mostly related to someone in the canon as I accidently tangled thair back stories together, opps. It has a reason promise, their not just thair relatives for no reason.

summary: idk how academia in the wizarding world works but the very least believable thing about harry potter is snape having his potions...
body:
idk how academia in the wizarding world works but the very least believable thing about harry potter is snape having his potions mastery at the age of like 21

admittedly, the wizard educational system is way different than modern school, especially from an american perspective, but also, like, let’s assume that the title of Master is obtained through the wizard version of university (or worse, is the equivalent of a “Masters”, a graduate degree), like, who the fuck is this Severus Snape kid, graduating with an entire degree by 21??

i know this bc im a bitter 22yo who still hasn’t gotten their undergrad degree and is looking forward to probable decades of grad school (that is, if i finish my degree before my degree finishes me!)

tags: its 2018 acceot that she is not trying
she is not gping to give us any actual gay dumbledore
some people just want thw brownie points
summary: Gotta love how some people really think that JK Rowling not explicitly showing Grindelwald and Dumbledore' s relationship is...
body: Gotta love how some people really think that JK Rowling not explicitly showing Grindelwald and Dumbledore’ s relationship is because she doesn’t think that being gay is something to be published as if it’s something unusual and not that she doesn’t want to risk cishet views

reblog.comment: Gotta love how some people really think that JK Rowling not explicitly showing Grindelwald and Dumbledore’ s relationship is because she doesn’t think that being gay is something to be published as if it’s something unusual and not that she doesn’t want to risk cishet views

trail.content_raw: Gotta love how some people really think that JK Rowling not explicitly showing Grindelwald and Dumbledore’ s relationship is because she doesn’t think that being gay is something to be published as if it’s something unusual and not that she doesn’t want to risk cishet views
trail.content: Gotta love how some people really think that JK Rowling not explicitly showing Grindelwald and Dumbledore’ s relationship is because she doesn’t think that being gay is something to be published as if it’s something unusual and not that she doesn’t want to risk cishet views

blog.name: which-witch-writes
blog.title: 𝔴𝔥𝔦𝔠𝔥𝔴𝔦𝔱𝔠𝔥𝔴𝔯𝔦𝔱𝔢𝔰
blog.description: Welcome to a world of head cannons, stories, aesthetics, siriusly bad puns and more.

summary:
When there is more than one time of the month
Lily: I’m sorry... I’m just... You know... At the moment so..
James, Sirius and...
body:
When there is more than one time of the month


Lily: I’m sorry… I’m just… You know… At the moment so..


James, Sirius and Peter: What?


Lily: I’ve got Aunt Irma visiting…


Peter: oh, do you not like Aunt Irma… I’ve got an aunt like that…


Lily: It’s my term for… my time of the month…


Sirius: Oh! What time of the month? The weekend?


Peter: Does Aunt Irma visit on the weekend?


Lily: You know… it’s high tide…


James: But we’re not on the coast.


Lily: I’ve closed for maintenance. I’ve fallen to the Communists!


Sirius: Well they do have some strong arguments.

reblog.comment:
When there is more than one time of the month


Lily: I’m sorry… I’m just… You know… At the moment so..


James, Sirius and Peter: What?


Lily: I’ve got Aunt Irma visiting…


Peter: oh, do you not like Aunt Irma… I’ve got an aunt like that…


Lily: It’s my term for… my time of the month…


Sirius: Oh! What time of the month? The weekend?


Peter: Does Aunt Irma visit on the weekend?


Lily: You know… it’s high tide…


James: But we’re not on the coast.


Lily: I’ve closed for maintenance. I’ve fallen to the Communists!


Sirius: Well they do have some strong arguments.

trail.content_raw:
When there is more than one time of the month


Lily: I’m sorry… I’m just… You know… At the moment so..


James, Sirius and Peter: What?


Lily: I’ve got Aunt Irma visiting…


Peter: oh, do you not like Aunt Irma… I’ve got an aunt like that…


Lily: It’s my term for… my time of the month…


Sirius: Oh! What time of the month? The weekend?


Peter: Does Aunt Irma visit on the weekend?


Lily: You know… it’s high tide…


James: But we’re not on the coast.


Lily: I’ve closed for maintenance. I’ve fallen to the Communists!


Sirius: Well they do have some strong arguments.

When there is more than one time of the month


Lily: I’m sorry… I’m just… You know… At the moment so..

Peter: oh, do you not like Aunt Irma… I’ve got an aunt like that…


Lily: It’s my term for… my time of the month…


Sirius: Oh! What time of the month? The weekend?


Peter: Does Aunt Irma visit on the weekend?


Lily: You know… it’s high tide…


James: But we’re not on the coast.


Lily: I’ve closed for maintenance. I’ve fallen to the Communists!


Sirius: Well they do have some strong arguments.

summary: I liked fb the crimes of grindewald but I cannot forgive JK for making Dumbledore a DADA professor when she wrote before that he...
body: I liked fb the crimes of grindewald but I cannot forgive JK for making Dumbledore a DADA professor when she wrote before that he was a Transfiguration one. It felt like a sloppy excuse to show him teaching like???? No dahling. Also McGonagall was not a teacher in 1927’s she was a student or maybe a kid like??? WTF JK DONT YOU EVEN KNOW WHAT YOU WROTE BEFORE???

blog.name: nargle-impeachment-committee
blog.title: I Suspect Nargles are Behind it
blog.description: Let’s face it, this blog isn’t NEARLY as organized as I had planned, but it’s still a great place for Harry Potter stuff, Taylor Swift stuff, ASOUE, coding resources, the occasional rant...

summary:
Joys that Harry Potter Movie Only Fans will never know:

-How amazing Oliver Wood actually is OMG

-Dudley Dursley’s...
body:
Joys that Harry Potter Movie Only Fans will never know:

-How amazing Oliver Wood actually is OMG

-Dudley Dursley’s character development

-“ARE YOU A WITCH OR NOT?!”

-Minerva McGonagall, Quidditch Fanatic

-Luna Lovegood, Quidditch Commentator

-RON WEASLEY IS BRAVE.

-GINNY WEASLEY IS AMAZING

-Sirius and Crookshanks: Ultimate Bromance

-“Ooh, you look much tastier than Crabbe and Goyle, Harry!”

-KREACHER’S CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT

-“I FELL IN THE LAKE!”

-Dean Thomas/Luna Lovegood Platonicship OMG

-Remus showing off Baby Photos

-Percy coming to his senses and finally making a joke

-“‘Probably trying to get rid of a Wrackspurt,’ said Harry, who recognized the symptoms.”

-Pigwidgeon

-Amnesiac Gilderoy Lockhart

-Dobby’s ever growing mismatched sock collection

-“FOR MASTER REGELUS!”

-Most of Tonks’s actual character

-Bill and Fleur’s actual relationship

-“ARE YOU A WIZARD OR NOT?!”

-Potterwatch

-Hermione’s growing political awareness and activism

-The entire school (-slytherins) standing to defend Harry from Pansy Parkinson

-100+ pages of backstory, 10x the character depth and development

Pains that Harry Potter Movie Only Fans will never know:

-“He was tiny in death”

-Molly Weasley’s boggart

-Meeting Neville’s parents

-Re-reading Prisoner of Azkaban and realizing that the nice man who helped Harry with his homework and gave him free sundaes dies in the sixth book.

-“He had no memory of being hugged like this, as though by a mother”

-Remus feeling so ashamed of being a werewolf that he thinks his family is better off without him

-Regulus Black’s full story

-Harry having to drag Percy away from Fred’s body

-Molly Weasley giving Harry a family heirloom for his 17th birthday

-Dean Thomas never knew his father, because he was a wizard and was killed by Death Eaters

-Peter Pettigrew didn’t even have the chance to redeem himself

-Frank Bryce was a war veteran who was blamed by his entire town for Voldemort’s crimes, and then Voldemort murdered him

-Harry not saying goodbye to Ron, Hermione, or Ginny, because he knows he won’t be strong enough to go through with it if he does

-“ ‘Does it hurt?’
The childish question had fallen from Harry’s lips before he could stop it.
‘Dying? Not at all,’ said Sirius. ‘Quicker and easier than falling asleep.’ ”

-The full story of Ariana and the Dumbledore family

-Winky’s entire existence, and all she suffers

-Andromeda Tonks losing her entire family

-“’NO!’
The scream was the more terrible because he had never expected or dreamed that Professor McGonagall could make such a sound.”

-100+ pages of backstory, 10x the character depth and development, over half of it leading to more pain and despair

summary:
Draco: I don't want to go out with you and your friends
Harry: I don't like Pansy and I still go out with her
Draco: But what if...
body:
Draco: I don't want to go out with you and your friends
Harry: I don't like Pansy and I still go out with her
Draco: But what if I end liking Weasley and Granger and then have to apologise to them?

summary: lee jordan turns potterwatch into a podcast that’s basically just him telling the world what harry james potter has been doing...
body:
lee jordan turns potterwatch into a podcast that’s basically just him telling the world what harry james potter has been doing with his totally mundane life since leaving hogwarts in a way that is probably borderline stalking him

it’s the most popular podcast on the wizard internet
